name: Some Memories
description:
I composed this song imagining a woman who remembers the past during the night. For that reason, I wrote a sad melody for the Oboe to play. This instrument brings a natural melancholy.
It is worth noting that the piano accompaniment has minor second and major second intervals, this creates a tension to accompany the sad melody of the oboe and the violin.
 
The instruments used in this composition were: Oboe, Piano, Violin and Synthesizer
 
Big extra points are awarded to those who notice that the melody of 0:58 seconds is the same melody as the main theme.

Music mixed and mastered in .wav 24 bits / 48.000hz

Visual art is about "traveling" in thought.
